    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="fr">Réfraction vers et loin de la normale</string>
            <string language="en">Refraction toward and away from the normal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brechung in Richtung und weg von zum Normal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Refraction para e away do normal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rifrazione verso e via dal normale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάθλαση προς και μακρυά από τον κανονικό</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Refracción hacia y lejos del normal</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre la réfraction de la lumière loin et vers de la normale pendant qu'elle traverse différents matériaux.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the refraction of light away from and toward the normal as it passes through different materials.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">réfraction de la lumière</string>
            <string language="en">light refraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">normale</string>
            <string language="en">normal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">caillou</string>
            <string language="en">pebble</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">rayon</string>
            <string language="en">ray</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">eau</string>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Brechung des Lichtes weg
und in Richtung zu vom Normal, während sie durch unterschiedliche 
Materialien überschreitet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o refraction da luz away 
e para do normal enquanto passa através dos materiais diferentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la rifrazione di luce 
via da e verso il normale mentre attraversa i materiali differenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τη διάθλαση του φωτός 
μακρυά από και προς τον κανονικό καθώς περνά μέσω των 
διαφορετικών υλικών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la refracción de la 
luz lejos y hacia del normal mientras que pasa a través de 
diversos materiales.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">helle Brechung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">normal</string>
          </keyword>
